name: clays-creative-solutions
description: Clay's Creative Solutions is your one-stop-shop for any website, web marketing, or translation needs. I am prepared to work with you in any capacity, whether that's updating a website for your company's new look, creating that look from scratch, accessing new markets, or a combination!

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
